item.title: Classification
item.description: Classification: Given options(classes), the function outputs the correct one. Classification Function (Model): $$ \delta(x) \begin{cases} g(x) > 0 & \text{Output = class 1} \cr else & \text{Output = class 2} \end{cases} $$ Loss Function The number of times f get incorrect results on training data. $$ L(f) = \sum_n\delta(f(x^n) \ne \hat{y}^n ) $$ Find the best function: Example: Perceptron, SVM 从训练数据中找出二分
